channel.title: Make Npc's talk
channel.description: I need to make my npc talk for my chirstmas event. How do i do this? i want him to talk when the person right clicks on him and hits "talk npc"

item.title: Make Npc's talk
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

he means you click the talk to option on the npcs and dialogue comes up… you have to add the dialoge in case 40 i think? after the switch statement. i don’t think it is case 40 but you can check… just search for a dialogue that is already in your server and thats where you have to add it (if you don’t know how to add it, just copy the dialogue you found and replace the text and the case number to whatever you are using)

Read full topic
